description: Banana and chocolate marble swirl muffins. A super fun addition to any packed lunch!
keywords: Muffins,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Banana Choc Marble Swirl Muffins Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the self raising flour and caster sugar together in a large bowl. Combine the lightly whisked eggs, milk and melted butter then add to the bowl. Add the mashed bananas too.
Mix until just combined. Take just under half the mixture to put into a separate bowl to add the cocoa powder and extra tablespoon of milk then gently mix to combine.
I used silicone muffin cases however you can use normal ones too. Alternate spoonfuls of banana and chocolate.
Use a toothpick to have fun and swirl! I started in the middle and made a snail shell shape and also did a few straight lines through some to achieve many patterns.
Bake on 180 degrees for 20 minutes turning the tray around after 15 minutes.
